languages.text: "Ему решать". {n}Нихель указывает на Паскаля.{/n} "Как и всегда".
"The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."
languages.original_text: "Ему решать". {n}Нихель указывает на Паскаля.{/n} "Как и всегда".

languages.text: 「決断は彼が下す」{n}ニヘルはパスカルを指さす。{/n}「いつもどおりに」
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."

traits.locale_text: 「決断は彼が下す」{n}ニヘルはパスカルを指さす。{/n}「いつもどおりに」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “决定权在他之手。”{n}妮赫尔指向帕斯卡。{/n}“一如既往。”
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."

traits.locale_text: “决定权在他之手。”{n}雅珀指向帕斯卡。{/n}“一如既往。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « La décision lui revient, {n}répond Nihel en pointant Pasqal du doigt.{/n} Comme toujours. »
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."

traits.locale_text: « La décision lui revient, {n}répond Nihel en pointant Pasqal du doigt.{/n} Comme toujours. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Es él quien debe tomar la decisión». {n}Nihel señala a Pasqal.{/n} «Como siempre».
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."

traits.locale_text: «Es él quien debe tomar la decisión». {n}Nihel señala a Pasqal.{/n} «Como siempre».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Das ist seine Entscheidung." {n}Nihel deutet auf Pasqal.{/n} "Wie immer."
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist seine Entscheidung." {n}Niehl deutet auf Pasqal.{/n} "Wie immer."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Karar ona ait." {n}Nihel, Pasqal'ı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Her zaman olduğu gibi."
languages.original_text: "The decision is his to make." {n}Nihel points to Pasqal.{/n} "As always."
